component.name: PosterItem
component.script: Sub Init() m.Poster = m.top.findNode("poster") m.Title = m.top.findNode("title") m.Published = m.top.findNode("published") m.Views = m.top.findNode("views") m.Background = m.top.findNode("ibackground") m.Creator = m.top.findNode("creator") End Sub Sub itemContentChanged() m.Poster.loadWidth = m.top.itemContent.thumbnailDimensions[0] m.Poster.loadHeight = m.top.itemContent.thumbnailDimensions[1] m.Poster.uri = m.top.itemContent.HDPOSTERURL m.Title.text = m.top.itemContent.TITLE m.Views.text = m.top.itemContent.VIEWS m.Creator.text = m.top.itemContent.CREATOR m.Published.text = m.top.itemContent.RELEASEDATE updateLayout() End Sub Sub updateLayout() If m.top.height > 0 And m.top.width > 0 Then m.Poster.width = m.top.width-20 m.Poster.height = 197 m.Background.width = m.top.width m.Background.height = m.top.height m.Title.width = m.top.width-20 m.Views.width = m.top.width-20 m.Published.width = m.top.width-20 m.Creator.width = m.top.width-20 End If End Sub
